PREMIUM MATERIALS&SUPERIOR QUALITY: Exquisite and smooth shape, wheels are made of rubber to absorb shocks. The sturdy plastic body is made of ABS plastic to prevent scratches , independent suspension system and flexible anti-skid wheels make your racing road unhindered! Requires 3 x AA car batteries and 2 x AA batteries for remote control; Package includes 1 x 1/24 RC car, 1 x remote control and 1 x user guide.

2.4Ghz Remote Drift Control Car: This RC drift racing car comes with 2.4Ghz remote, 2.4Ghz frequency operation, more stable, long running time, longer control distance, Ideal as a teamwork or competition game to help your child improve social skills and reduce the use of smart products.

EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE: 1: 24 scale racing car, remote control drift car can go forward, backward, turn left and right, other full-scale synchronous control functions. The Remote control is very easy to besimple operation. Power hard shell is not easily damaged by impact during driving. The speed can reach up to 10KM/H, which provide you a faster high-speed racing experience. The front of the car has cool lights, and night driving is more attractive.

IDEAL GIFTS FOR KIDS AND ADULTS: The remote control car is the best toy for children to explore the field of automotive technology. You not only play with it using the remote control, but also place it as an exhibit on display shelf. Being the ideal toy gift for kids as their hobby RC drift cars. Perfect for birthday gifts, stocking stuffers or rewards and so on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super fast fun!
reviews.reviewText: GUOKAI Remote Control Car, 1/24 Scale RC Sport Racing Toy Car, Compatible with Lamborghini Veneno, is nothing short of super fast fun!Shipped fast.Boxed tigh and secure.Easy to use, easy to control.Travels on most surfaces, hardwood floors to carpets.Comes with a cheaply made REMOTE CONTROL.Great features include, alignment, forward, reverse and side-to-side.Head and tail lights work.Overall, a fun little race car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love the size of the car —great gift option
reviews.reviewText: My kids are big fans of cars and I bought them this remote control car. They were thrilled to receive it. The car is light and the remote control is also at a good size so that my 5-year-old can easily hold on her hands and control the move. So far, it brought a lot of joy and I would recommend it as a good gift too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars very small and fragile
reviews.reviewText: My 6 year old son loves rc cars/trucks or anything remote controlled. I ordered the car for him and I thought he would get a lot of use out of it but that wasn't the case. The battery life is okay....the range of the remote to car is okay at best and the car itself is small and fragile

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool remote car, best choice for boys
reviews.reviewText: Cool color and design, with remote options. Very good toys for boys. My 5-year old is so excited to have it and played it for the whole day when he received it. A little smaller than expected, but the price is totally worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy for both my kids to use
reviews.reviewText: Great design of the lamborghini and easy controls that both my 4 and 7 uear old can play with it and have fun. They love to race each other and see who can do obstacles the fastest. Its a simple rc, not too fast and not too slow, works best on hard surfaces, not carpets. Its a great gift idea as it isnt expensive and actually works well. It seems like itll be able to withstand some wear and tear. Looks like a win as thy wont seem to stop playing with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Zippy little car
reviews.reviewText: When the product arrived, I realized I hadn't paid attention to the size of the car in the description. The photos made it look pretty big. That said, for a car as small as this, it they paid attention to detail. It looks like a nice model of a Lamborghini.The controls are pretty traditional. You can adjust wheel alignment, and move forward, reverse, and side to side. It is a pretty quick little car too. On a full battery, it can quickly go wherever you want to send it. I tried it on carpet, linoleum, and cement, and it performed well on each. There was a noticeable loss of speed on carpet, but it was still functional.My main problem with this car is the remote. It feels really cheap, and contrasts significantly with the quality of the car. I feel like the controller came from the 99 cent store. It doesn't feel sturdy, and the recessed directional controls aren't as easy to use as the standard joystick style. The remote looks pretty different from the one depicted in the operation manual, so it seems that the remote might vary per shipment. That is just speculation, but it seems interesting to note.Overall, this is a nice, quick little car. It is nice to look at, and fun to operate. As long as the remote stays intact, I think I'll get quite a bit of use out of this car. Hopefully the remote can be replaced when the time comes. Otherwise, it will end up being just a nice model car, which isn't so bad.

Bought this toy for my son. It is bigger than I thought, which is good. Quality is good. Its body material is sturdy. Head lights are on when running. Remote control response is acute and precise. Very good toy for kids. My son loves it.

Gave the GUOKAI Remote Control Car as a gift, and it's been a hit. The quality is impressive, and the vibrant colors add to its appeal. The kid absolutely loved it, making it a perfect choice for a delightful and entertaining present.

A really nice car toy. Nice controller and gives smooth enough control. The shape, detail and color are all good. Bought for my cats, and they really love it😁😁😁.Perhaps only Minor issue is that it uses battery really fast. But a chargeable battery may help so no big deal.Anyway, nice toy for kids and pets!
The cars did not even last 2 weeks before they broke. and i can't get a hold of the seller or amazon won't help!

Remote car is powerful yet stylish and elegant. Finishing is really good and I like the detailing of the design. Build quality is really good and it can take few hits on to the walls still remain strong. Quite impressed with the car and it will be lot of fun not just for kids but adults too. Pretty looks of the car makes it usable a showpiece too. Rubber tires are really good and able to stop car even on a smooth surface as you can see in the video. Speed is really good and it has potential to give tough competition to other Remote Cars. Having regular removable batteries makes it convenient as you don't have to wait for them to get charged unlike other cars. Happy with the purchase
